subject: Request for Pending Commission Payment
description_text:
Dear Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

My name is Wytch Brittany, an affiliate partner currently promoting your
brand. I’m writing to follow up regarding an outstanding commission payment
that has not yet been received.

Here are my details for your reference:

Name: Wytch Brittany

Email: wytchbrittany@gmail.com

PayPal Account: chunhan1980@gmail.com

I would appreciate it if you could kindly review the status of this payment
and let me know if any further information or clarification is needed from
my side.

I look forward to your prompt response and a swift resolution.

Thank you for your time and cooperation.

Warm regards,
Wytch Brittany
wytchbrittany@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Wytch Brittany,  Thank you for supporting our products! I’ve informed our sales team to prepare your commission statement and instructed them to arrange payment via PayPal in the coming days. No need to worry — it's being taken care of.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Fri, Jul 18, 2025 at 1:29 PM service@simsonn.com
